Package index

All functions

UrlStringdbGrah()
Create an URL for string-db gene network from a vector of gene names.
addUrlLink()
Create a html balise for Gene Ontology description on ebi.ac.uk
app_server()
Server part of IIDEA
app_ui()
User interface of IIDEA
boundGroup2()
IIDEA post-hoc bound table on gene set.
cleanBiofun()
Clean gene set matrix gived by user
cleanGo.GS()
Clean go.gs data sets. Not used
cleanMatrix()
Clean expression matrix gived by user
exampleData()
Create example data set
load_bulkRNAseq_datasets()
Install GSEAbenchmarkeR dataset from the TCGA RNA-seq compendium to be used in IIDEA
load_microarray_datasets()
Install GSEAbenchmarkeR dataset from the GEO2KEGG microarray compendium to be used in IIDEA
matchMatrixBiofun()
Check if genes in gene set match with a gene set list
readCSV_sep()
Read multiple csv configuration
run_IIDEA()
Open IIDEA
thrYaxis()
Create a new y-axis for Volcano plot based on calibration threshold.
